message.body: You've been quiet lately. Everything OK? You going to see Sagmeister tonight?

Sorry HI!!! No I can’t I’m in NY! I’ve been quiet bc Nate was here, and now I’m in NY going to speak tonight at Hunter college for six minutes. I just sent some more work upstate to show! I’m doing well just busy. NEXT FOCUS: NEW JOBS! I miss you lots... I’ll be back tomorrow night... What are you doing Saturday after class?
Great news! Glad you've been working hard! Good luck speaking tonight--though you won't need it! Let's chat when you get back. :-)
Are you free saturday night Saul?
Thanks for being awesome
Can't think beyond class on Saturday... lots of preparation to do. But yes, I'm probably free.
ok check in again then
I know what that feels like
I’m doing a project I’ve already taught, so it is EASY!
for me!
in march it will get hard again
FYI, the T will be closed this weekend. Not sure there will be classes Saturday at the SMFA. I just emailed Debra.
I emailed her too today.
I'm texting with Becky
She shard your Spain itinerary with me!!! Omg!!! So fun.
Saul there couldn't possibly be classes on Saturday. Wow. This is so extreme.
The response from CE was a little, umm, tone deaf. I won't bother to forward it to you.
Get home safe. It's gonna be cold!
What do you mean
Like are classes cancelled
I'm taking at amtrak tomorrow am
I might try to spend some time away from The snow.
I think I'll beat the storm but if classes are def cancelled
Erica said classes are on. But the mayor has shut down the T the entire weekend.
That's what I know.
FYI, I just bumped into Nicole on the street! Ha!
There is no street it's all snow covered
I'm basically back in boston. Assuming they won't cancel classes on Saturday. Have you heard anything?

Nope, nothing. I'm waiting to see whether the T will actually shut down. Am hoping they will make an announcement (either way, open or closed) this afternoon. If it's going to be closed, then holding class is in question.
I may just hold class through a Google+ Hangout.
Oh that's an idea
Is that easy to do
I need to do a presentation
I can screen share with them
This is very frustrating bc I emailed Debra about a couple things and haven't heard back yet
Google+ Hangout is very easy to use and you can share your screen. You can even "draw" on it!
I know I love google hangout!!!
I don't know how to group but I can figure it out
